questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to rescue Sanji from a political marriage, involving a battle against the Big Mom Pirates. What is...?
This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Black Leg', is the Straw Hat Pirates' chef and a master of Black Leg Style martial arts. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
